testcase.name: Test_5_Email_End_Syntax_validation_for_Email_id_0_Comment_id_101_Postid_21_by_user_Samantha

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. JSON path email[0] doesn't match. Expected: (a string ending with "@rod.com" or a string containing "@rod.org" or a string containing "@rod.net" or a string containing "@rod.de" or a string containing "@rod.us" or a string containing "@rod.co.uk" or a string containing "@rod.biz") Actual: Lura@rod.tv
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ( TestNG Listener class Message for Failed Test Case ) - Test 5 - is Fail for Email_End_Syntax_validation_for_Email_id_0_Comment_id_101_Postid_21_by_user_Samantha End syntax of Email_id_0_ is found not matching to the standard generic top-level domains (gTLD) being compared for this test like - ( .com/.org/.net/.de/.us/.co.uk/ .biz/ ) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
